mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RAP.application ( application_name, application_code, description, status, owner_name, owner_email, created_by, updated_by ) VALUES ( #{applicationName}, #{applicationCode}, #{description}, #{status}, #{ownerName}, #{ownerEmail}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RAP.application SET application_name = #{applicationName}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, owner_name = #{ownerName}, owner_email = #{ownerEmail}, updated_at = GETDATE(), updated_by = #{updatedBy} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, application_name, application_code, description, status, owner_name, owner_email, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.application WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, application_name, application_code, description, status, owner_name, owner_email, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.application WHERE application_code = #{applicationCode}
SELECT id, application_name, application_code, description, status, owner_name, owner_email, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.application ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, application_name, application_code, description, status, owner_name, owner_email, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.application WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, application_name, application_code, description, status, owner_name, owner_email, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.application WHERE application_name LIKE '%' + #{namePattern} + '%' ORDER BY application_name

SELECT id, application_name, application_code, description, status, owner_name, owner_email, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by FROM RAP.application WHERE owner_email = #{userEmail} ORDER BY created_at DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
